website_summaries.verdict: This capsule-based machine is perfect for users on the go. Works with Nescafé-brand capsules.
pros: Produces a flavorful cup of coffee
Allows user to choose cup size and strength of their brew
Users can also brew hot or cold coffee-based beverages with this machine
This unit can be used to dispense hot water for tea or soup
cons: Coffee pods are hard to find

customer_reviews.title: Perfect machine and better than keurig
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I flew the nest I was really hesitant to buy or try any coffee machine. I had tried keurig pods and the coffee just didn’t please me. I’ve heard horror stories of mold in coffee machines. I went to England to visit my in laws and my brother in law had a Nescafé machine. I instantly fell in love! The coffee was amazing and it was convenient and so much faster than the keurig. So I had to come home and buy this! This machine is PERFECT. It’s made from a high quality brand, easy to set up, easy to clean, easy to use, and the coffee is amazing. I’m so glad I waited for the perfect machine.
customer_reviews.author: G. Powers

customer_reviews.title: The best machine out there!
customer_reviews.text: I loveeee this coffee maker. I first used it at a friend's house in Brazil and absolutely loved the coffee. I had already tried just about every single cup coffee machine out there, including those that sell at $1000 plus and chose this one mostly because there is simply NO coffee that tastes like the Dolce Gusto. I see lots of people complaining of issues with water pump etc, I had NO problem at all getting the machine to work. I just wish it was sold in stores along with the coffee capsules. It's a bit frustrating having to buy it from Europe, specially the Cafe au Lait, not sold anywhere in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Bhtown

customer_reviews.title: Great Cappuccino and espresso,
customer_reviews.text: I was a big keurig user till I bumped into Nescafe’s offering. This machine ( Dolce gusto) is “Magic”.(so far) Had it for 3 weeks, marvelous coffee, great choices, ideal for the European “in the house”. Easy to use, fast brew, and hot or cold. Absolutely brilliant, and a great price, which was due to me buying a first gen. brewer. The new gen machine allows you to dial in 10-12oz brews, for $50 more, but it’s real simple to achieve them with the gen1 brewer. Nice one Nescaf

product_meta.title: De’Longhi NESCAFÉ Dolce Gusto Esperta Single Serve Coffee Maker and Espresso Machine - 60oz Capacity – Capsule Based
product_meta.description:
Jumpstart your day with the De’Longhi Esperta Single Serve Coffee Maker and Espresso Machine. The Esperta is a professional-grade pressure based system that allows you to squeeze the most flavor, aroma, and body from the coffee to deliver a high quality cup every time, and is exclusively for NESCAFÉ Dolce Gusto capsules. It features a user friendly interface with adjustable features making it the perfect go-to morning cup maker that offers the optimal coffee making experience. This 60-ounce espresso machine is the perfect hostess for family gatherings or entertaining guests. The Esperta offers a wide array of hot and cold drinks that cater to all coffee drinkers. The offerings range from your basic morning black cup of coffee, to a Vanilla Latte Macchiato. The 15-bar automatic pressure regulator allows for you to customize your drink to the way that you want it.

This coffee machine boasts numerous state of the art features - a new wheel interface that allow you to customize your cup of coffee the way you want, and a flow-stop system that automatically shuts off once the bars indicated have been brewed. It has a Thermoblock heating system that allows for faster brewing times because it does not require any preheating to be done. Enjoy your favorite cup of morning coffee with the De’Longhi NESCAFÉ Dolce Gusto Esperta Single Serve Coffee Maker and Espresso Machine.

1. TRUSTED BRAND - Nestle’s NESCAFÉ Dolce Gusto is an award winning coffee machine brand for all coffee lovers. Their innovative machines are manufactured through the collaboration of Nestle’s NESCAFÉ coffee and DeLonghi’s engineering system. This guarantees you that every cup you make is full of freshness from the best-tasting ingredients.

2. ENERGY SAVING – This coffee maker features an energy saving automatic stand-by mode that switches off after being idle for five minutes. The electricity efficient capabilities make this not only a great caffeine machine but also an environmentally and pocket-friendly electronic device.
feature_bullets: PRESSURE BASED SYSTEM - The Esperta is a professional-grade pressure based system that that will allow you to extract and squeeze the most flavor, aroma, and body from the coffee to deliver a high quality cup every time

EXCLUSIVELY FOR DOLCE GUSTO CAPSULES - The Esperta Single Serve Coffee Maker is exclusively for NESCAFÉ Dolce Gusto capsules. Easily prepare gourmet coffees, espressos, lattes, cappuccinos, iced drinks and more. Dolce Gusto patented smart capsules help to keep coffee fresh until the moment you brew, and works with the dolce gusto system to regulate the pressure and ensure every cup is made to your liking

EASY INTERFACE - Boasting a new easy-to-use wheel interface with a 7-level LED display, the Esperta allows you to control the size and intensity of your coffee, giving you a truly customized coffee experience. Just match the led bars to the bars on your dolce gusto coffee or milk capsule and brew by selecting the hot or cold button depending on your coffee selection

HOT AND COLD COFFEE DRINKS - Explore the wide variety of decadent flavors, and both hot and cold coffee drinks offered by NESCAFÉ Dolce Gusto with this capsule-based coffee machine. With 18 flavor varieties, you can make an authentic espresso, or choose from Americano, Chococino, Cappuccino, Macchiato, Latte, and many more flavors

SHORTER BREWING TIME - This state of the art equipment has a special Thermoblock heating system that controls and balances the temperature, and requires no preheating. This allows for no warm up time, and the ability to brew a cup of coffee in a minute or less
